title: Political and Business Leaders Share Views on Covid-19, Inflation, China, and Biden’s Social and Climate Bill
sub_head: Tesla Founder Elon Musk,  Pfizer CEO Albert Bourla and others across industries spoke at The Wall Street Journal’s CEO Council Summit
body:
The Omicron Covid-19 variant, President Biden’s roughly $2 trillion social-policy and climate bill, inflation and competition with China were some of the issues that engaged business and political leaders this week at The Wall Street Journal’s CEO Council Summit.
—Albert Bourla, chief executive of Pfizer Inc. on global vaccine distribution in Africa
